name: Name
entriesDeleteConfirm: Do you want to delete the selected entries? This action can't be undone.
entriesCopyHint: Copies all currently visible entries ({}) to the system clipboard. No duplicates will be copied.
entriesMarkNotUsedConfirm: Do you want to mark this entry as available?
entriesSelectRandomHint: Selects the specified number of random entries. Already selected entries remain. Active searches / filters remain active.
presetMustContain:
Must contain placeholders %RAFFLE_NAME%, %RAFFLE_URL%, %PRODUCT% and %KEY%.
Can contain the optional placeholder %PLATFORM%.
presetRestoreConfirm: Do you want to restore the default Mail templates? This will overwrite all your changes.
presetDeleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete the '{}' mail template?
platformRestoreConfirm: Do you want to restore the default platforms? This will overwrite all your changes.
platformDeleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete the platform '{}''?
settingsCantDeleteLastEntry: The last entry can't be deleted.
toolsDateSetOffsetInfo: Adds the desired number of days, weeks and months to the current date.
toolsDateSetTimeInfo: Override the time for the defined date.
errorClipboard: Error - Couldn't copy entries to clipboard.
errorNoPreset: Error - At least one mail template must be available, to be able to notify winners.
errorNoPlatform: Error - At least one platform must be available, to be able to add new entries.
errorNoMailApp: Error - Could not launch mail app.
errorNoFileExplorer: Error - Could not launch file explorer.
errorCountToHigh: Error - The selected number exceeds the available entries.
errorCountToSmall: Error - The selected number is equal to or less than the number of entries already selected.
